name: ActionOutletComponent

inputsClass.name: items
inputsClass.rawdescription: The current items to display in the action dropdown.
inputsClass.description: The current items to display in the action dropdown.

propertiesClass.name: components$
propertiesClass.description: Returns the items that are displayed at the top navigation.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Returns the items that are displayed at the top navigation.

propertiesClass.name: isPageToolbarExpanded
propertiesClass.description: Identifies if in a mobile view the toolbar is expanded or not.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Identifies if in a mobile view the toolbar is expanded or not.

propertiesClass.name: templatesAndLabels$
propertiesClass.description: Returns the items that are displayed in the "add"-dropdown ordered by priority.
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Returns the items that are displayed in the "add"-dropdown ordered by priority.

methodsClass.name: invoke
methodsClass.rawdescription: Invokes action after an action is clicked.
methodsClass.description: Invokes action after an action is clicked.

description: This component is used as the outlet to show the action list. In a c8ycli app it is by default placed on the header component near app-switcher.
rawdescription:
This component is used as the outlet to show the action list.
In a c8ycli app it is by default placed on the header component near app-switcher.

setSignature.name: items
setSignature.rawdescription: The current items to display in the action dropdown.
setSignature.description: The current items to display in the action dropdown.
